resources.string: “Nature is impersonal, awe-inspiring, elegant, eternal. It\'s geometrically perfect. It\'s tiny and gigantic. You can travel far to be in a beautiful natural setting, or you can observe it in your backyard - or, in my case, in the trees lining New York City sidewalks, or in the clouds above skyscrapers.” \n\n-Gretchen Rubin
